description: This file declares an interface 'IController' for controlling or managing certain aspects of a plugin or module within the WPEFramework, including methods for persistence, deletion, rebooting, environment querying, configuration handling, and cloning.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface that defines methods for controlling plugin modules, including persistence, deletion, reboot, environment, configuration, and cloning operations.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persists the current state or configuration.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes the specified path or resource.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves the environment variables or settings specified by index.

methods.name: Configuration (getter)
methods.description: Retrieves the configuration associated with the given callsign.

methods.name: Configuration (setter)
methods.description: Sets or updates the configuration for the given callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone of a given callsign with a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
